Others: Luka Doncic played despite being less than 100% healthy.
Doncic finished the game with 16 points, 6 rebounds, 6 assists, and 2 steals.
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the San Antonio Spurs 110-93.
The victory snapped a four-game losing streak for the Mavs.
Luka Doncic promised to get better.
The Mavs are currently 6-7 in their first 13 games, placing them as the tenth seed in the Western Conference.
The team's struggles have been more pronounced on the road, where they are 5-3.
The Mavs will visit the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday evening.
